description.raw:
This reverts one line of pull request #403 that enabled pushing updates to bottle pull requests that didn't originate from `osrfbuild`. We can still assume that pull requests will be originated from `osrfbuild` though.

* broken build: https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/os_homebrew/job/generic-release-homebrew_pull_request_updater/148/

* fixed build with this branch: https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/os_homebrew/job/generic-release-homebrew_pull_request_updater/149/

title.raw: still create pull requests from osrfbuild account
title.html: still create pull requests from osrfbuild account
